titulo: Smarter buildings as part of the energy system for increased efficiency and flexibility – Societal Readiness Pilot
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all of the following expected outcomes:Measurable reduction in buildings’ energy demand together with a reduced gap between their as-designed and as-built energy performance;Measurable increase in the number of building typologies with smart grid connected renewable energy sources (RES) and energy storage together with increased flexibility in grid/network management and operations;Measurable enhancement of the smart readiness of bui
